item.title: Fejo – Workil Aanu Karyam Lyrics ft MC Mushti [Prod. Ashkar Farzi]
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: “mallu rapper FEJO’s” latest Malayalam rap song ‘Workil Aanu Karyam’  is a thrilling track.The artist has directed the music, penned…
item.content:encoded:
“mallu rapper FEJO’s” latest Malayalam rap song ‘Workil Aanu Karyam’  is a thrilling track.The artist has directed the music, penned its
lyrics as well.

Workil anu karyam

Song Name : Workil Aanu Karyam

Lyrics : Fejo , MC Mushti

Singer(s): Fejo , MC Mushti
Production : Ashkar Farzi

Tharam thiruvukal 

Thala vena
manushyar 2 mathram
Aanum penna
Hridayathil sneham
oro Chundilum thena
Pullanmaar chadi kadikkum, Oh man ,ithu vena
Prethikarikkannam enikku 
ithu ente time’aa
Engage all defences
& get this man a pena
Ee kadha parayum njan like MCU
ant man’le michael penna
Rap’iloode orukkum njn ivide 
Puthiyoru snehathin sena (say)
tholi niram ninte velu veluppu anengilum
tholi niram ninte karu karuppu anengilum
ente nere kurakkalle 
kurakku nee volume
mone ninte lookil alla, Workil Aanu karyam
tholi niram ninte velu veluppu anengilum
tholi niram ninte karu karuppu anengilum
ente nere kurakkalle 
kurakku nee volume
mone ninte lookil alla, Workil Aanu karyam
kothichathu kayyadakkum, ithanu ente vashi
koottukaru koodeyundu , athanu ente rashi
shut up your freaking mouth, you bloody parihasi
njan vidhikal ezhuthimattum, rapper malayali
thudarum ivide ini ente vilayattam
nee ellam key koduthal thullum, verum kalipattam
ente niram karuthalum chuvannalum veluthalum
poruthi vijayam nedum ithanu ente bhavam
ninte ahankaram
ninte azhinjattam
ellam thedi chennethikkum ninte avasanam
nirthikko parihasam
elkilla lavalesam
ne oru Amul baby ennal, njan oru ithihasam
ividengum andhakaram, dharidhryathin bhalyam
ella chathikalkkum koottu ninnu kalikalam
kannukal thurannu pidi; lokam ninte swantham
vakkil alla mone ninte; Workil Aanu karyam
tholi niram ninte velu veluppu anengilum
tholi niram ninte karu karuppu anengilum
ente nere kurakkalle 
kurakku nee volume
mone ninte lookil alla, Workil Aanu karyam

tholi niram ninte velu veluppu anengilum
tholi niram ninte karu karuppu anengilum
ente nere kurakkalle 
kurakku nee volume
mone ninte lookil alla, Workil Aanu karyam

neeyum njanum dress like sadaranakkaran
chintha level up like asadaranakkaran
adhwanam illel, ne thanne aakum ninte kaalan
madi pidichu irikkum manassu avanoru charan
para sahayam illa, ottappedunnu manyan
paradooshanam, parayan paranjalo vachalan
poymughangal azhinju veezhunnu
reaction, Ashok Raj’ne kanda barber Balan
peril karyamundo, athokke verum noun
sathyathine maraykkuvan darikkano gown
njangale enthum paranjo
ne swantham prishtam chorinju
ennalum we will never ever ever go down
(ay ay)
nammude tholiyathu brown vayil
velli karandi illa, clown ente
thalayude mukalil orikkalum irikilla
garv enna crown
ala thallum jeevitham oru kadal azham
erunnu pokalle drown
Workil Aanu Karyam
vakyam muzhanganam village,city & town
tholi niram ninte velu veluppu anengilum
tholi niram ninte karu karuppu anengilum
ente nere kurakkalle 
kurakku nee volume
